meanings.sent1: The new student felt lost in the unfamiliar school hallways.
meanings.sent2: The explorer found himself in an unfamiliar jungle.
meanings.sent3: The cat stared at the unfamiliar toy with suspicion.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded like an unfamiliar melody in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the exotic fruit was so unfamiliar yet intriguing.

meanings.sent1: The shy child avoided eye contact with unfamiliar faces.
meanings.sent2: She hesitated to enter the unfamiliar house.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked at the unfamiliar mailman, thinking he was a threat.
meanings.sent4: The old book had an unfamiliar smell that intrigued the librarian.
meanings.sent5: The unfamiliar language on the sign made it hard to understand the directions.
